events.text:
While I rotted away in my cell, the same thoughts kept looping in my head, again and again.
A lookalike.
A copy.
A double.
The man I killed wasn't even the man I killed. He'd probably been hired by Dab to throw the cops off his scent while he went after his next sick scheme. All he to do was put on some face paint and spit shitty rap, and he had us all fooled.
I was in here, and Thoroughbred was still out there, somewhere.
Days passed. My wife, WIFENAME2, came to see me. Begged me to tell her that it wasn't true. That the drunk and disheveled detective she married and came home late at night reeking of booze and dirt couldn't be a killer.
Sorry honey. Guess you weren't the best judge of character.
One week after rotting in that cell, and that's when it happened.
That's when I got a call.
Souls, phone call for you.

I hauled myself out of my cot, wondering who had anything to say to a sad sack like me. Led by the guard out of my cell, and down the hall.
I picked up the phone.
John Souls speaking.
Pussa bitch.
No.
You.
That's right, idiot.
What do you want?
That's no way to talk to the man you tried to kill. I'd start with an apology.
Only thing I'm sorry for is that it wasn't you.
Hey, I stood where you're standing once. Word of advice, "I'd do it again" doesn't get you parole, loser.
Go ahead scum. Gloat.
Oh, I intend to. I just wanted to call and let you know that your latest video went viral.
What?
You. Murdering me.
I... I don't understand.

Let me explain. I want you to know, because it's funnier if you do.
See, I knew you were asking around after me. And I had just paid my body double a hideously large sum of money to sit in my estate, snort my cocaine, and do nothing while the cops jerked themselves off in their cruisers waiting for me to make a move.
Why waste the opportunity? I called him up, told him to set up a camera, and call you a bitch. Over and over.
You're telling me... you called me there...
To fuck with you, dawg. I was gonna put it online. After selling it, of course.
Sell it? What? No. You can't mean...
That's right, boiiiiiii.
The glee in his goddamn voice. I could have killed him all over again.
NFTs, motherfucker.
I was going to be sick.

Don't ask me why, because I don't have the slightest goddamn clue, but these DUMB MOTHERFUCKERS will drop fat shits of cash out of their silicon valley studded assholes to pretend they own a video that millions of people can watch for free. Especially if they've got an airtight blockchain saying they saw it before anybody else.
A video of me, calling you a bitch over and over again, while you snarled in that knockoff Batman voice and pretended you had some kind of, of, moral authority, or some shit? Comedy gold.
But then you stone cold murdered that motherfucker. I was like "HOLY SHIT DAWG." You have no idea.
Fuck you.
He giggled like an idiot at that.

So yeah. Instead of you getting trolled by a coked up imposter, I got a goddamn snuff film. I sold a token providing proof of ownership to some trust-fund dipshit and made BANK. If I wasn't already a very rich man...
Thoroughbred leaned into the phone, and his disgusting, wheedly, self-important voice sang his victory into my ear.
You would have made me one.
And then it hit me.
Wait a goddamn minute... Henry. Stevem. Chugs. You've been farming NFTs.

BINGO. Popular videos that entertain thousands, MILLIONS of people, get chump change for ad revenue compared to what one idiot will pay to think he owns it. And they'll pay MORE to see it before everybody else. Chugs didn't want to play ball, of course, but that doesn't matter. I've been funneling money from rich idiots into my own pockets for months now.
I'm going to own this goddamn city and rebuild it in my own image. Las Borpas is mine, funded by the entertainment opium of the masses and the foolishness of the wealthy.
I win.
No, you... I'll...
Do what? Kill me? You tried already, motherfucker. It didn't take.

I'm out here, and you're in there, because this time, John Souls? YOU'RE the bad guy. YOU'RE the murderer. You think this is the bad ending?
WRONG. The murderer went to jail. The BRILLIANT and HANDSOME and SUCCESSFUL billionaire with a very large penis escaped death. This is the good ending.
If there WAS justice in this fucked up world, this is what it would look like. The bad guy going to jail for the crime he committed.

And I didn't have a goddamn thing to say to that. What was there to say?
He was right. I was the murderer, and I landed in prison, where I belonged.
This is the good ending.

Anyhow, just called to let you know.
Later, idiot.
